name: The Tomb
description:
The Tomb

Blort and Poob find themselves trapped in an ancient tomb, and they (or just Blort) must find and collect mysterious objects to discover a way out.

This is my first ever game using the bitsy tool, and my first ever completed game.

*Special thanks to my sister Emma for both inspiring me and helping me on this project,  ayolland for the use of the borksy tool, and Adam for bitsy as a whole*
